data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_ApiAuthenticationOptions_ApiKeyHash
data.value: API key in hashed form. Each byte should be two hexadecimal-based digits.
data.comment: The description provided for the ApiKeyHash parameter on ApiAuthenticationOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_ApiAuthenticationOptions_ApiKeyHashType
data.value: Hash algorithm used to compute ApiKeyHash, typically 'SHA256'. 'SHA1' and 'MD5' are not allowed.
data.comment: The description provided for the ApiKeyHashType parameter on ApiAuthenticationOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions_AccountKey
data.value: The account key used to access the Azure blob storage account.
data.comment: The description provided for the AccountKey parameter on AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions_AccountKeyName
data.value: The name of the account key used to look up the value from the Egress options Properties map.
data.comment: The description provided for the AccountKeyName parameter on AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions_AccountUri
data.value: The URI of the Azure blob storage account.
data.comment: The description provided for the AccountUri parameter on AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions_BlobPrefix
data.value: The prefix to prepend to the blob name.
data.comment: The description provided for the BlobPrefix parameter on AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions_ContainerName
data.value: The name of the container to which the blob will be egressed. If egressing to the root container, use the "$root" sentinel value.
data.comment: The description provided for the ContainerName parameter on AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions_SharedAccessSignature
data.value: The shared access signature (SAS) used to access the azure blob storage account.
data.comment: The description provided for the SharedAccessSignature parameter on AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions_SharedAccessSignatureName
data.value: The name of the shared access signature (SAS) used to look up the value from the Egress options Properties map.
data.comment: The description provided for the SharedAccessSignatureName parameter on AzureBlobEgressProviderOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_CommonEgressProviderOptions_CopyBufferSize
data.value: Buffer size used when copying data from an egress callback returning a stream to the egress callback that is provided a stream to which data is written.
data.comment: The description provided for the CopyBufferSize parameter on all egress provider options.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_ConsoleOptions_FormatterName
data.value: Name of the log message formatter to use. Defaults to 'Simple'.
data.comment: The description provided for the FormatterName parameter on ConsoleOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_ConsoleOptions_FormatterOptions
data.value: Formatter options for the built-in console log formatter.
data.comment: The description provider for the FormatterOptions parameter on ConsoleOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_ConsoleOptions_FormatterOptions_IncludeScopes
data.value: Gets or sets whether scopes should be included or not.
data.comment: The description provider for the IncludesScopes parameter on FormatterOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_ConsoleOptions_FormatterOptions_TimestampFormat
data.value: Gets or sets format string used to format timestamp in logging messages. Defaults to null.
data.comment: The description provider for the TimestampFormat parameter on FormatterOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_ConsoleOptions_FormatterOptions_UseUtcTimestamp
data.value: Gets or sets indication whether or not UTC timezone should be used for timestamps in logging messages. Defaults to false.
data.comment: The description provider for the UseUtcTimestamp parameter on FormatterOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_ConsoleOptions_LogToStandardErrorThreshold
data.value: The minimum level of messages are written to Console.Error.
data.comment: The description provided for the LogLevel parameter on ConsoleOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_CorsConfiguration_AllowedOrigins
data.value: List of allowed CORS origins, separated by semicolons.
data.comment: The description provided for the AllowedOrigins parameter on CorsConfiguration.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_DiagnosticPortOptions_ConnectionMode
data.value: In 'Connect' mode, dotnet-monitor connects to the application for diagnostics. In 'Listen' mode, the application connects to dotnet-monitor via EndpointName.
data.comment: The description provided for the ConnectionMode parameter on DiagnosticPortOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_DiagnosticPortOptions_EndpointName
data.value: In 'Listen' mode, specifies the name of the named pipe or unix domain socket to use for connecting to the diagnostic server.
data.comment: The description provided for the EndpointName parameter on DiagnosticPortOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_DiagnosticPortOptions_MaxConnections
data.value: In 'Listen' mode, the maximum amount of connections to accept.
data.comment: The description provided for the MaxConnections parameter on DiagnosticPortOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_EgressOptions_AzureBlobStorage
data.value: Mapping of Azure blob storage egress provider names to their options.
data.comment: The description provided for the AzureBlobStorage parameter on EgressOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_EgressOptions_FileSystem
data.value: Mapping of file system egress provider names to their options.
data.comment: The description provided for the FileSystem parameter on EgressOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_EgressOptions_Properties
data.value: Additional properties, such as secrets, that can be referenced by the provider definitions.
data.comment: The description provided for the Properties parameter on EgressOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_FileSystemEgressProviderOptions_DirectoryPath
data.value: The directory path to which the stream data will be egressed.
data.comment: The description provided for the DirectoryPath parameter on FileSystemEgressProviderOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_FileSystemEgressProviderOptions_IntermediateDirectoryPath
data.value: The directory path to which the stream data will initially be written, if specified; the file will then be moved/renamed to the directory specified in DirectoryPath.
data.comment: The description provided for the IntermediateDirectoryPath parameter on FileSystemEgressProviderOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_FormatterNameOptions_Json
data.value: Reserved name for Json console formatter.
data.comment: The description provider for the Json parameter on FormatterNameOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_FormatterNameOptions_Simple
data.value: Reserved name for simple console formatter.
data.comment: The description provider for the Simple parameter on FormatterNameOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_FormatterNameOptions_Systemd
data.value: Reserved name for systemd console formatter.
data.comment: The description provider for the Systemd parameter on FormatterNameOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_LoggingOptions_CaptureScopes
data.value: Gets or sets whether logging scopes are being captured. Defaults to true.
data.comment: The description provider for the CaptureScopes parameter on LoggingOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_LoggingOptions_Console
data.value: Logging options for the Console provider.
data.comment: The description provided for the Console parameter on LoggingOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_LoggingOptions_Debug
data.value: Logging options for the Debug provider.
data.comment: The description provided for the Debug parameter on LoggingOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_LoggingOptions_EventLog
data.value: Logging options for the EventLog provider.
data.comment: The description provided for the EventLog parameter on LoggingOptions

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_LoggingOptions_EventSource
data.value: Logging options for the EventSource provider.
data.comment: The description provided for the EventSource parameter on LoggingOptions

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_LoggingOptions_LogLevel
data.value: Logging options for the LogLevel provider.
data.comment: The description provided for the LogLevel parameter on LoggingOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_LogLevelThreshold_Critical
data.value: Logs that describe an unrecoverable application or system crash, or a catastrophic failure that requires immediate attention.
data.comment: The description provided for the Critical logging severity level on LogLevelThreshold.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_LogLevelThreshold_Debug
data.value: Logs that are used for interactive investigation during development. These logs should primarily contain information useful for debugging and have no long-term value.
data.comment: The description provided for the Debug logging severity level on LogLevelThreshold.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_LogLevelThreshold_Error
data.value: Logs that highlight when the current flow of execution is stopped due to a failure. These should indicate a failure in the current activity, not an application-wide failure.
data.comment: The description provided for the Error logging severity level on LogLevelThreshold.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_LogLevelThreshold_Information
data.value: Logs that track the general flow of the application. These logs should have long-term value.
data.comment: The description provided for the Information logging severity level on LogLevelThreshold.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_LogLevelThreshold_None
data.value: Not used for writing log messages. Specifies that a logging category should not write any messages.
data.comment: The description provided for the None logging severity level on LogLevelThreshold.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_LogLevelThreshold_Trace
data.value: Logs that contain the most detailed messages. These messages may contain sensitive application data. These messages are disabled by default and should never be enabled in a production environment.
data.comment: The description provided for the Trace logging severity level on LogLevelThreshold.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_LogLevelThreshold_Warning
data.value: Logs that highlight an abnormal or unexpected event in the application flow, but do not otherwise cause the application execution to stop.
data.comment: The description provided for the Warning logging severity level on LogLevelThreshold.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_MetricProvider_CounterNames
data.value: Name of custom metrics counters.
data.comment: The description provided for the CounterNames parameter on MetricProvider.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_MetricProvider_ProviderName
data.value: The name of the custom metrics provider.
data.comment: The description provided for the ProviderName parameter on MetricProvider.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_MetricsOptions_Enabled
data.value: Enable or disable metrics collection.
data.comment: The description provided for the Enabled parameter on MetricsOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_MetricsOptions_Endpoints
data.value: Endpoints that expose prometheus metrics. Defaults to http://localhost:52325.
data.comment: The description provided for the Endpoints parameter on MetricsOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_MetricsOptions_IncludeDefaultProviders
data.value: Include default providers: System.Runtime, Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting, and Grpc.AspNetCore.Server.
data.comment: The description provided for the IncludeDefaultProviders parameter on MetricsOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_MetricsOptions_MetricCount
data.value: Amount of data points to store per metric.
data.comment: The description provided for the MetricCount parameter on MetricsOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_MetricsOptions_Providers
data.value: Providers for custom metrics.
data.comment: The description provided for the Providers parameter on MetricsOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_MetricsOptions_UpdateIntervalSeconds
data.value: How often metrics are collected.
data.comment: The description provided for the UpdateIntervalSeconds parameter on MetricsOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_ProcessFilterDescriptor_Key
data.value: The criteria used to compare against the target process.
data.comment: The description provided for the Key parameter on ProcessFilterDescriptor.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_ProcessFilterDescriptor_MatchType
data.value: Type of match to use against the process criteria.
data.comment: The description provided for the MatchType parameter on ProcessFilterDescriptor.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_ProcessFilterDescriptor_Value
data.value: The value of the criteria used to compare against the target process.
data.comment: The description provided for the Value parameter on ProcessFilterDescriptor.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_ProcessFilterKey_CommandLine
data.value: Performs a match based on the contents of the command passed to launch the process on the system; this typically includes the executable path and arguments to the process.
data.comment: The description provided for enum ProcessFilterKey's CommandLine value.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_ProcessFilterKey_ProcessId
data.value: Performs a match based on the numerical ID of a process on the system.
data.comment: The description provided for enum ProcessFilterKey's ProcessId value.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_ProcessFilterKey_ProcessName
data.value: Performs a match based on the name of a process on the system.
data.comment: The description provided for enum ProcessFilterKey's ProcessName value.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_ProcessFilterOptions_Filters
data.value: Process filters used to determine which process to use if one is not explicitly specified. All filters must match.
data.comment: The description provided for the Filters parameter on ProcessFilterOptions.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_ProcessFilterType_Contains
data.value: Performs a case-insensitive substring search.
data.comment: The description provided for enum ProcessFilterType's Contains value.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_ProcessFilterType_Exact
data.value: Performs a case-insensitive string comparison.
data.comment: The description provided for enum ProcessFilterType's Exact value.

data.name: DisplayAttributeDescription_StorageOptions_DumpTempFolder
data.value: The location for temporary dump files. Defaults to the temp folder.
data.comment: The description provided for the DumpTempFolder parameter on StorageOptions.
